results.content: It's a wonderful course. It exceeded my expectations
results.content_html: It's a wonderful course. It exceeded my expectations

results.content: Really good material! Very pleased. The coverage of secret keys alone made this course worthwhile. So many other RoR courses skip right over this very important topic.

response.content: I'm happy that you are enjoing the course, Scott! Any real-world app depends on using some external APIs. Keeping secret keys encrypted is a must, especially if you want to opensource your source code ;)
response.content_html: I'm happy that you are enjoing the course, Scott! Any real-world app depends on using some external APIs. Keeping secret keys encrypted is a must, especially if you want to opensource your source code ;)
